name: TONY THE RAT MAN'S FUNKY MUSIC
name_original: TONY THE RAT MAN'S FUNKY MUSIC
description:
You are a regular human(?) person. You are in a room, no doors, no windows, no exit. There is a rat. He calls himself "Tony The Rat Man." He talks like an Italian mob boss for some reason. He wants you to listen to his "funky music." You may be trapped in this neon prison until the end of time, but at least you have some company, and, some FUNKY MUSIC!

use the WASD or the ARROW keys to move and interact with objects! (if you're on mobile you should be able to swipe to move/interact)

I made this to test out Bitsy, which can be found here!  https://bitsy.org
